body.name: Crossbody Sling Backpack Sling Bag, Small Chest Bag Daypack Fanny Pack Cross Body Bag for Hiking Traveling Outdoors
features: The sling bag made with high-quality tear and water-resistant nylon material, which provides extra strength and long-lasting performance. Breathable mesh shoulder straps help reduce pressure on your shoulders and keep you comfortable.

The adjustable strap can adjust to most sizes for comfortable wear of the small bag on your front or back. The shoulder sling bag strap is long enough to adjust from 22 inch to 43 inch, Perfectly fit your body.

Dimension: 11.2" x 6.1" x 3.2". The Sling bag with multiple compartments and pockets, can hold your phone, wallet, cards, passport, key and any essentials in daily life. Internal zipper pocket is safe for protecting your valuable items inside.
The chest bag provides enough space for hiking, camping, outdoor, cycling and shopping. It is easy to carry and use. Perfect for work, vacation and any outdoor activities.
Can be used as sling bag / chest bag / cross body bag / hiking backpack / shoulder bag. It is a great gift for women, moms, wife, friends on Mother's Day, Christmas, Holidays, Valentine's Day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little bag
reviews.reviewText: Love this bag. The only thing to make it better would be to have a hoop at the top to carry it when I have my heavy winter coat on. It’s small but has tons of room with multiple zippers to easily organize all of the stuff I think I need in there. Good quality, great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous well made crissbody
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a trip. I was impressed by all this purse held. I used it while traveling by plane. Held many items. Never once felt heavy or bulky. Did not cause any pain or discomfort after using it for eight hours. Highly recommend. And the price was excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value for a solid work bag
reviews.reviewText: I use this product every day to bring my personal belongings and work equipment with me everyday. Small and low profile enough that it fits in a small cube locker, yet large enough to fit most of my daily work needs. You can stuff a pretty decent sized book in there with plenty of space of box cutters, a phone and other small tools you might need.The bag comes with a USB-A extension, allowing you to carry a small power bank to charger your phone (phone cable not included). While I personally have not had the need for this feature, it’s a welcome inclusion to the bag as you never know when you might need a quick charge.The bag is semi-waterproof, though I wouldn’t suggest long exposure to heavy rain. I live in a rainy climate area and occasionally get soaked in water. But have yet to have a single drop penetrate the bag (my books have always stayed completely dry).The metal zippers are great quality. I zip and unzip the bag many times per day, and have been using this for months with no signs of wear or tear.My only grip is that the shoulder strap is very limited in the adjustment capabilities. I’m not the tallest or biggest person, and the shoulder strap makes for the bag to hang a bit lower than I’d have wanted, but (to me) this is such a trivial issue that I would still give the product 4/5 stars.Great product and highly recommend for anyone who needs a subtle and non-flashy bag that is small enough to fit in a small locker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Buy for Travelers - Sturdy and Lots of Compartments!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to use on an overseas trip. I wanted something I could have my hands/eyes on at all times versus a cross body purse, backpack, or other type of purse. This has 2 main pockets that fit A LOT of stuff (one has an additional zipped pocket), along with a front zipped small pocket, front open pocket, and a back zipped compartment. With so many compartments, I was able to keep all of my things organized and secure. I was never needing an additional pocket. The quality is excellent - I definitely tested it's structural integrity and it delivered. What was additionally convenient is for pictures, I could easily sling it backward so that all you saw was a strap, and then sling it back in place in front of me without having to remove it. I will use this for every overseas trip in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfy and stylish
reviews.reviewText: I use this bag daily. It has so much room in it unlike other sling bags I have purchased. I carry a make up bag that's a bit on the bigger side and it fits perfectly in the big pocket and then plenty of room in the other pockets for my phone and little wallet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Convenient and Casual Design But Not So Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Before purchasing this bag, I did lots of searching for the perfect bag to carry everything I needed when I go places and travel, all including my kindle, and finally decided on this one. The design is very simple, more of a casual wear bag for every day use. It fit everything I needed to carry without looking too bulky. All black material, with a kind of rain coat, water resistant type of material, and all black zippers. I did not have any issues with the zippers, and when I have walked through the rain, I did not have any issues with water getting in. I did however have an issue with the straps. If you like to wear your bag in the front, which I prefer, you can only wear it crossing over your right shoulder because of the permanent placement of the straps, unless you swing it around to wear on your back. And if you are like me and have broad shoulders and like to carry a lot of things in your bag, it is definitely NOT COMFORTABLE. The strap tends to slide up to my neck and rub and burn while wearing it. Also, the strap links are square and tend to turn on it's side when using it. I would have to do A LOT of readjusting when I wore it.As much as I liked this bag and it was very affordable for what I was looking for, the biggest and worst part was the comfort of it, or the lack there of. Unfortunately I decided to return it and purchase a different bag under a different brand. Comfort over style for me, and this was NOT IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I chose the product for its size an convenience for a quick grab gaming bag. The back Middle zipper is secured easy to keep important items close, the middle zipper on the other side is easily accessible. The inside easily holds my key, charger and cellphone and misc items. Really like the external usb port with the internal port that connects to my charger. I Like that the DRings on the bag are metal and the clip on the strap is Metal. Comfortable shoulder strap an easy to adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight and perfect size for personal items. Great for hands free. Plenty of compartments. Wearable to the front or back. Easy to access your items.
